CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Renewal Reminder' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Cuti Premi' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Lapse Konven' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'MKP' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Lapse TM' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'RTU') && TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)== 'Approved',APE_Convert__c,IF(TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Redemption TM' && TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)== 'Inforced',APE_Convert__c,0))
CustomField.label: Amount Conserved
